review: after a few day stay at The grand dragon we home on to another hotel in leh. Sun N Sand. again best in class: budget hotel. please try visiting this place in May-June. do not visit before that and after that. this is a budget hotel it becomes 5 star before may and after Jun. transport available. food not that good. we use to have food at a restaurent close to the hotel. hotel is located in the heart of the city.
name: ram2812
